name: Yūutsuna Nikki
description:
The game is just a concept, It will be finished next year

                            Created for the Dream Diary Jam 5                                                                  Plot

Jikotsuki is unable to leave his room. However, when he goes to sleep, he enters to the Dream World.

Here, he will enconter strange places, weird creatures and incredible objects that will grant him special abilities.

Controls ControlsActionWASDMove
EInteractQWake Up (Dream Only)SHIFTToggle Sprint (Dream Only)ESCPause Menu
